A

AbstractController - Class in com.mygdx.othello.controllers
This class is the template for all Controllers in the application
AbstractController(GameStateManager) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.othello.controllers.AbstractController
 
AbstractScreen - Class in com.mygdx.othello.views
This class is a template for all the Screens in the application
AbstractScreen(GameStateManager) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.othello.views.AbstractScreen
Initialize the AbstractScreen
abstractScreens - Variable in class com.mygdx.othello.controllers.GameStateManager
Stack of AbstractScreen that the app renders on the screen
AI - Variable in class com.mygdx.othello.models.Board
Boolean indicating if AI mode is ON or not
AIGameController - Class in com.mygdx.othello.controllers
This class manipulates the game logic while playing as well as all the touch input on the screen Only used when playing versus the AI
AIGameController(GameStateManager, GameScreen, Board) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.othello.controllers.AIGameController
 
AIMode - Variable in class com.mygdx.othello.views.MenuScreen
Player vs AI Button
at1 - Variable in class com.mygdx.othello.views.GameScreen
Atlas that stores the dark green texture
at2 - Variable in class com.mygdx.othello.views.GameScreen
Atlas that stores the bright green texture
atlas - Variable in class com.mygdx.othello.views.MenuScreen
Atlas used to store all the buttons' textures
atlas - Variable in class com.mygdx.othello.views.RulesScreen
Stores the Main Menu button texture
atlas - Variable in class com.mygdx.othello.views.SettingsScreen
Stores the texture for the buttons
